detectors.description:

	- ERC20Detailed.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#333-335) (function)
Pragma version^0.5.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#1) allows old versions
Redundant expression "this (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#11)" inContext (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#3-14)

ALFAToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#343-348) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(_msgSender(),1000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ALFAToken.sol#345)
